outputs.output_descr: The project will allow the National Ozone Unit to continue to plan, organize, direct and coordinate all activities required for the implementation of Bangladesh's strategy in all areas related to the Phase-out of Ozone Depleting Substances under the Montreal Protocol

project_descr: Institutional strengthening for the Phase-out of ODS Phase VI
project_title: Institutional Strengthening for the Phase-out of ODS VI
